title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Stephen T. Stone with a comment about Clarence Thomas using an originalism argument against the actual malice standard: I once again note that if Clarence Thomas truly believed in constitutional originalism⁠—i.e., the notion that the ghosts of the Founding Fathers and the original form […]
